name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana
summary: A government scheme for water resource management and irrigation.
benefits: Provides financial support for irrigation development.

name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana
summary: Promotes organic farming among small and marginal farmers.
benefits: Financial assistance for organic certification and training.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
summary: A crop insurance scheme to protect farmers against crop loss.
benefits: Covers natural calamities, pests, and diseases.

name: PM-KISAN
description: Provides financial assistance to small farmers.
benefits: Rs. 6000 per year in three equal installments.
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers in India.

name: Kisan Credit Card
description: Provides credit to farmers for agricultural needs.
benefits: Low-interest loans for seeds, fertilizers, and equipment.
